text: License to Drive is a 1988 American comedy movie directed by Greg Beeman and starring Corey Haim, Corey Feldman, Carol Kane, James Avery, Heather Graham, Richard Masur, Nina Siemaszko, Michael Ensign. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1988 comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Greg Beeman Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies about automobiles
title: License to Drive
